function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Social risk related to negative attitudes from friends, family, and associates due to COVID-19 travel","Impact":"Potential loss of esteem, respect, and friendships","Mitigation":"Educating about safety measures, communicating travel choices, and promoting understanding","Technologies":"Social media, communication platforms","People":"Tourists","Owner":"Travel agencies, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Performance risk in tourism due to COVID-19 travel","Impact":"Tourists not receiving anticipated vacation benefits","Mitigation":"Ensuring proper performance of products and services, providing transparent information about safety measures","Technologies":"Health and safety protocols, customer feedback systems","People":"Tourists, travel service providers","Owner":"Travel service providers, tourism organizations"},{"Description":"Image risk of a country due to COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Negative impact on culture, traditions, and economy of a country","Mitigation":"Promoting accurate information, implementing effective health measures, and maintaining transparency","Technologies":"Media, public communication platforms","People":"Tourists, local population","Owner":"Government, tourism organizations"}]}
